page.title: 10SCHOOLS,SCHOOL LIFE,DRAYTON
page.content: There are{Middle and First schools in both{Drayton and Taverham,}the children from these schools going mainly to the{High schools}at{Taverham and{Hellesdon.}A rapid rise in the population due to the recent housing developments has seen a corresponding rise in the pupil numbers.Children start school at the age of 5, spending 4 years in both First and Middle schools. Much attention in the first few years is paid to English and Mathematics, the{curriculum}also covering Environmental Studies, Arts, Music and Physical Education. Opportunities are given for children to learn to swim,play musical instruments, follow up{hobbies}such as gardening or computing as well as to practice{sports}like football,netball, badminton and cross-country running.
